title: nIvE nAkika
sahitya:
nIvE nAkika nA I jIvita nAvanu sarigA naDapaga svAmI 


caraNam 1    dEshamu korakai dEhamu korakai Ashalu kOrikalennO galavu
AshIrvadinci bhOgamu losagi A pai dAsuni yOgini cEyumu
    caraNam 2    nA sangItamutO sarvamu nA svAdhInamau naTula gAvimpumu 
svacchamaina muraLI sangItamu saccidAnanda rUpamu gAdA
